items.html: At Devoted Health, we want to make it easy for you to care for our members. On this page, you'll find all the resources to help you do that, from provider guides and referral lists to detailed instructions on how to use our portal.
For information about authorizations, referrals, claims status, and more, visit our provider portal.
Questions? Call us at 1-877-762-3515, 8am to 5pm.
View our 2023 Provider Manual
View our 2024 Provider Manual
What to expect in 2024
Find provider quick reference guides and information about joining our network.
Get resources for Availity, our Provider Portal, authorizations, member eligibility, and more.
Use these resources to improve Star ratings and the healthcare experience of your patients.
Log in to Availity
• New to Availity? Register and get started.
Register and get started.
• Use our Provider portal training library to get training resources for Availity, our Provider Portal, authorizations, referrals, member eligibility, and more.
Provider portal training library
You have 3 options to submit claims to us: Change Healthcare, Availity, or paper claims.

Change Healthcare
You'll need to work with your practice management system to connect to Change Healthcare.

Availity
You can use Availity to submit claims, referrals, and more. See our claims resources for detailed instructions.

Paper claims
We suggest submitting your claims electronically through Change Healthcare or Availity. If you'd rather use paper claims, here's the data you'll need:

Make sure to send your paper claims to:
Devoted Health, Inc.
Claims
PO Box 211524
Eagan, MN 55121
Send any mail via USPS to ensure delivery. Some mail carriers don’t deliver to PO boxes.
You can use the Devoted provider portal to check claims status and submit an electronic dispute. View our claims resources.
View our claims resources.

Practitioner credentialing is initiated once a contract is executed and the practitioner is loaded into our system. We utilize CAQH applications to complete credentialing. To avoid delays in the credentialing process, please ensure the following:
• The CAQH profile is complete and contains all required information (including current malpractice insurance)
• Devoted Health is authorized to access the application
• Application has been re-attested within the past 120 days
Before ordering durable medical equipment for our members, check our list of covered items.
To place an order, contact Integrated Home Care Services directly:
Integrated Home Care Services referral guide
If you're located in one of the states listed below, call us directly at 1-877-762-3515 for benefits questions or to find a provider.
• For 2023, if you're in Alabama, Illinois, or Texas, call us directly
• For 2024, if you're in Alabama, Hawaii, Illinois, Pennsylvania, or Texas, call us directly
• Log in to Payspan to register for EFT and download and print electronic versions of Explanation of Payments (EOPs)

document-title.description: Documents must have <title> element to aid in navigation

heading-order.description: Heading levels should only increase by one

html-has-lang.description: <html> element must have a lang attribute

html-lang-valid.description: <html> element must have a valid value for the lang attribute

landmark-main-is-top-level.description: Main landmark should not be contained in another landmark

landmark-no-duplicate-banner.description: Document should not have more than one banner landmark

landmark-no-duplicate-contentinfo.description: Document should not have more than one contentinfo landmark

landmark-no-duplicate-main.description: Document should not have more than one main landmark

landmark-one-main.description: Document should have one main landmark

link-in-text-block.description: Links must be distinguishable without relying on color

Claims

You have 3 options to submit claims to us: Change Healthcare, Availity, or paper claims.
You have 3 options to submit claims to us: Change Healthcare, Availity, or paper claims.

Change Healthcare
You'll need to work with your practice management system to connect to Change Healthcare.

Availity
You can use Availity to submit claims, referrals, and more. See our claims resources for detailed instructions.

Paper claims
We suggest submitting your claims electronically through Change Healthcare or Availity. If you'd rather use paper claims, here's the data you'll need:

Make sure to send your paper claims to:
Devoted Health, Inc.
Claims
PO Box 211524
Eagan, MN 55121
Send any mail via USPS to ensure delivery. Some mail carriers don’t deliver to PO boxes.
You can use the Devoted provider portal to check claims status and submit an electronic dispute. View our claims resources.
View our claims resources.

Practitioner credentialing is initiated once a contract is executed and the practitioner is loaded into our system. We utilize CAQH applications to complete credentialing. To avoid delays in the credentialing process, please ensure the following:

1. The CAQH profile is complete and contains all required information (including current malpractice insurance)
  2. Devoted Health is authorized to access the application
  3. Application has been re-attested within the past 120 days
• The CAQH profile is complete and contains all required information (including current malpractice insurance)
